name: And then we decayed
description:
You wake up in a strange room.

A strange being is next to you.

It tells you to play a game with it before an event happens.

The game is simple: move your tokens to the marked spot. Then capture the enemy tokens. However, said spot is always moving, and each token is different.

Win all rounds, then you'll know clues about how you ended up here.

( This game was done quickly for a jam. Please report any bugs. )
